name: Disable of ETW Trace
description: Detects usage of powershell cmdlets to disable or remove ETW trace sessions
note: **Detection Rule without Regex for better understanding. Be careful, this way is case sensitive:**`(powershell.file.script_block_text:*Remove\-EtwTraceProvider\ * OR (powershell.file.script_block_text:*Set\-EtwTraceProvider\ * AND powershell.file.script_block_text:*0x11*))`
